{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Calix |model=804 |revision=Mesh |fcc_date=10/30/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |series=AC2100 |type=access point, repeater, mesh node |fcc_id=2ABLK-804MESH |ic_id=4009A-804MESH |pcb_id=45-403-000593 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Quantenna |cpu1_model=QT3860BC;Quantenna, QT3860BC, AA02F2D1, A04920, 1626; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GU6MB-12 |expansion_if_types=PCIe x1 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_module_if=PCIe (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3860BC;Quantenna, QT3860BC, AA02F2D1, A04920, 1626; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B;QT2518B, AA00G0D1, A07615, 1725; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER;RTL8192ER, H512H32 GH20; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E;RTL8211E, H413F31, GH168; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=DFS (master), DFS (slave), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |oui=EC:4F:82 |oui_eth=EC:4F:82 }} {{TagLine|Calix 804 Mesh Satellite}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.calix.com/systems/gigafamily-overview/GigaCenters.html}} {{•}} [http://eecatalog.com/wireless/2017/08/22/calix-first-to-bring-booming-mesh-wi-fi-opportunity-to-service-providers-major-enhancements-to-gigacenter-take-subscriber-experience-to-next-level/ Press Release]
"45-403-000593" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
:[[Calix 804Mesh]] Satellite to the ''Calix GigaCenters''
[[Calix 844E GigaCenters]] • [https://www.calix.com/platforms/non-exos-premises-systems/gigafamily-overview/GigaCenters.html PPage] *Compatible with any broadband technology: :The 844E is a Ethernet WAN service delivery center compatible :with Calix ONTs deployed on B6 GPON/Active Ethernet, ::C7 GPON, E7 GPON/Active Ethernet and BLM GPON *Product Attributes: :Wi-Fi 2.4GHz 802.11n (300Mbps) :Wi-Fi 5GHz 802.11ac (1733Mbps) :Layer 2 and Layer 3 services :Gigabit service capable :Managed by Compass *Interfaces: :1x GbE WAN ports :4x GbE LAN ports :2x POTS ports
===See also=== *[[Calix 804Mesh]] *[[Calix GigaHub 813Gv2-1]] *[[Calix GigaHub 814G-1]] *[[Calix GigaHub 823G-1]]
